actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to name the building to be constructed in Lufkin, Texas, and leased to the United States as the "Colonel Homer Garrison, Jr., Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the building to be constructed in Lufkin, Texas, and leased to the United States as the Colonel Homer Garrison, Jr. Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to name the building to be constructed in Lufkin, Texas, and leased to the United States as the "Colonel Homer Garrison, Jr., Federal Building".
